contents.text: Thank you for calling Ceres Imaging in the East Bay, your partner for high-resolution spectral imagery services in agriculture.
If you would like to learn about our agricultural spectral imaging services or request a quote, press 1.
To request a personalized imaging quote, press 1.
Thank you for choosing Ceres Imaging; please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Get a personalized quote for high-resolution spectral imaging services on my farm
I’m a veteran farmer looking to get a cost estimate for your crop imaging services.
I need a detailed quote for high-resolution multispectral imaging services with NDVI and crop-health analytics.
I need a personalized quote for agricultural spectral imaging on my property.
Obtain a personalized quote for multispectral imagery for my crop experiment.

contents.text: To schedule a site demonstration of our imaging solutions, press 2.
Please hold for a moment while we transfer you to a demonstration specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule an on-site demonstration of Ceres Imaging’s technology
I’d like to schedule an on-farm demonstration of your spectral imaging technology.
I’d like to schedule an on-site demonstration of your UAV-based hyperspectral imaging system over my fields.
I’d like to schedule an on-site demonstration of your imaging services.
Schedule an on-site demonstration of your imaging system for my thesis research.

contents.text: If you are an existing client and need assistance, press 2.
For questions about your image delivery or account details, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you to customer service.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my recent image delivery and billing
I need information about my recent image delivery and billing details.
I’m an existing client—please check the delivery schedule for my processed spectral datasets and review my account invoice.
I need to check my image delivery status and review my account details.
Inquire about the delivery status of my recent imaging order.

contents.text: For technical assistance with processing or interpreting your spectral data, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support experts.

navigationGoals: Get technical help processing and interpreting my spectral data
I need technical help interpreting the spectral data we received.
I need technical support to calibrate, process, and interpret my raw spectral data into reflectance maps.
I need help processing and interpreting the spectral data I received.
Request technical support for processing and interpreting my spectral data.
